collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (100 total Queries, 83 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT DISTINCT total, codigo, valor FROM kardex WHERE fecha BETWEEN '2023-12-28' AND '2024-04-03' and idcompra=0 and idconcepto=10
SELECT DISTINCT id_categoria FROM kardex WHERE fecha BETWEEN '2023-12-28' AND '2024-04-03' AND id_categoria IS NOT NULL order by id_categoria;

SELECT SUM(valor_total_producto) AS total, SUM(cantidad) AS cantidad, (valor_total_producto / cantidad) AS valor_unitario, producto.nombreproducto, codigo FROM detalle_devolucion_venta INNER JOIN producto ON detalle_devolucion_venta.codigo = producto.codigointernoproducto WHERE fecha_venta BETWEEN '2023-12-28' AND '2024-04-03' GROUP BY detalle_devolucion_venta.cantidad, detalle_devolucion_venta.valor_total_producto, detalle_devolucion_venta.codigo, producto.nombreproducto
SELECT SUM(total) as valor_total, SUM(cantidad) as cantidad, total FROM kardex WHERE fecha BETWEEN '2023-12-28' AND '2024-04-03' AND total = 15200 AND codigo = '201' GROUP BY kardex.total
SELECT SUM(total) as valor_total, SUM(cantidad) as cantidad, total FROM kardex WHERE fecha BETWEEN '2023-12-28' AND '2024-04-03' AND total = 6100 AND codigo = '282' GROUP BY kardex.total

queries.hover: This query was called more than once.

queries.hover: This query was called more than once.
